ygData.subject: Now We Wait.

* Iron Raptor watched as Prowl forced Dinobots mouth open, quickly stepping 
up and looking down into the dagger filled mouth.
She would have to get a few small pirces of cloth to cover his teeth, so 
that they didn't puncture the tube.
With a steady hand she then pushed the tube down into the Maximals mouth and 
to the back of his throat, almost waiting for him to wake up and start 
gaging. But he never did.
Iron Raptor applied pressure to the tube until she felt it slidinw doen his 
throat and towards his stomach, finally stopping when she felt resistance at 
the end of the tube.
It had reached the destination.
She then leaned back and looked at the tube as it protruded from Dinobots 
mouth, gesturing to Prowl that he could let go.
However, she wasn't done yet.
Iron Raptor stalked over to a small cupboard in the room and flung the doors 
open, reaching in the shuffling about until she came out with a piece of 
cloth.
She easily tore the piece in two and walked back to the injured bot, simply 
placing the cloth over his teeth so that the tube would remain intact.
Then, leaning over to the energon bag she flicked a switch and the liquid 
began to flow slowly down the tube and into Dinobots stomach.
There, that task was done.
Now...to the air.

Iron Raptor walked over and took the air resporator, which would breath for 
the warrior once it was instulled, and a tube.
She quickly scanned the interior of his neck and discovered the internal 
system which controled his breathing.
Iron Raptor quickly brought the resporator over to the metal table and 
hooked up the tube, knowing that they now had less then 2 min to get 
everything working right again.
With no time to spare she simply stood up and retracted the claws from her 
fingertips, simply slashing across Dinobot's neck and thrusting the tube 
into the opening, doing the same to it as she did the stomach tube. Pushing 
it into the lungs until she felt resistance, then simply switching the 
resporator on.
Now, that was all that she could do for him.
Iron Raptor sighed and placed a cloth over the fresh wound in Dinobots neck 
to soak up any fluid that might escape.
She then leaned back and looked over at prowl, her arms and torso completely 
covered in mech-fluid.*

" Now...we wait."
